result.name: exceptions-to-cross-government-moratoria-on-spend-in-dft
result.notes:
The government has introduced a strict moratorium in 5 key areas of discretionary spend: - consulting - Information and communications technology (ICT) - recruitment - marketing - property Exceptions to the moratoria in key areas for Department of Transport are listed in documents.

Information on GOV.UK about DfT exceptions to the moratorium on discretionary spend.

organization.name: department-for-transport
organization.title: Department for Transport
organization.description:
We work with our agencies and partners to support the transport network that helps the UK’s businesses and gets people and goods travelling around the country. We plan and invest in transport infrastructure to keep the UK on the move.

DFT is a ministerial department, supported by 22 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport

result.title: Exceptions to cross-government moratoria on spend in DfT
